name: Who is slackgineer?
description:
Who is slackgineer?*slackgineer=slacker+engineer

One day, you are working with a engineer on the same project, you need to cooperate with him/her to fulfill the project requirement, but you two are both teammates and competitors.

Work as a team also show your performance!

---

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2022, thanks for the contribution of the team.

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/who-slackgineer-4
